data.name: This Bed We Made
data.detailed_description:
February 17, 1958. Sophie's shift at the Clarington Hotel begins like any other â€” until she opens the door to room 505 and a crimson light comes out...

About This Bed We Made


This Bed We Made is a third-person narrative mystery game that allow you to indulge your curiosity about the hidden lives of others. Take on the role of Sophie, a nosy chambermaid in the 1950s, and discover the sinister mystery that binds the hotel guests through the strange objects they bring on their travels.
